posts.post_title: WTB Old Mill series 6 bluegrass league cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: william turner
Finanical problems have kept me out of the running on these cards over the past two years but I want to by any card from this set that is avaliable.  I am interested in any grade and any card in the set that anyone has avaliable.  I am really interested in kentucky related cards and that is what I am trying to focus on even though I know they are really hard to find.  Thanks as always

William
